original_text: And there were a thousand men of Benjamin with him, and Ziba the servant of the house of Saul, and his fifteen sons and his twenty servants with him; and they went over Jordan before the king.
korean_text: 베냐민 사람 천 명이 그와 함께 하고 사울 집안의 종 시바도 그의 아들 열다섯과 종 스무 명과 더불어 그와 함께 하여 요단 강을 밟고 건너 왕 앞으로 나아오니라

sentences.original_text: And there were a thousand men of Benjamin with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 베냐민 사람 천 명이 있었고

sentences.original_text: and Ziba the servant of the house of Saul
and his fifteen sons and his twenty servants with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 열다섯 명과 종 스무 명이 그와 함께 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and they went over Jordan before the king
